Package ch.bfh.ti.ostes2.gossip

A package which tries to provide a kind of simulation for the gossip architecture.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Message
    This class is an interface for the message containers: ActionMessage and GossipMessage.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionMessage
    This class acts as container for messages used either to perform updates from a Frontend to a ReplicationManager or for a ReplicationManager to answer a request from a Frontend.
    Frontend
    This class represents the Frontend in the gossip architecture.
    GossipMessage
    This class acts as container for messages used to send gossip messages between ReplicationManagers.
    LogRecord
    This class represents a single record within the update-log of a ReplicationManager.
    QueryMessage
    This class acts as container for query messages between a Frontend and a ReplicationManager.
    ReplicationManager
    This class represents the ReplicationManager in the gossip architecture.
    Utils
    A class providing various helper functions for time stamps as well as definitions of tags used for communication of Messages.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ActionMessage.Operation  

Package ch.bfh.ti.ostes2.gossip Description

A package which tries to provide a kind of simulation for the gossip architecture. For details see https://staff.hti.bfh.ch/swp1/PC/Folien/AufgabeGossip.html
Author:
sosterwalder
